experience.title: Frontend Developer
info: Collaborated with a large and diverse team, seizing the opportunity to work on projects that utilized cutting-edge technologies, and focusing on frontend development using Agile methodologies in the Akinon and Shopify platforms.

experience.title: Frontend Developer
